RelatedSentence: Last week 's trade show offered something for everyone .

A0: American trade show featuring equipment and technology
RelatedSentence: Texprocess Americas , the largest North American trade show featuring equipment and technology for the development , sourcing and production of sewn products , was held last week at the Georgia World Congress Center in Atlanta , Ga .

The show , owned by Messe Frankfurt and co-produced with SPESA , featured a new Technology Solutions Pavilion highlighting such technologies as 2D / 3 D design , PLM , ERP , costing , supply chain management and shop floor control ; the Cool Zone , hosted by [ TC ] 2 , which showcased current and future leading - edge technologies ; and approximately 170 equipment , solution and service providers and organizations , including Lectra , Infor , Gerber Technology and Yunique Solutions , Simparel , Human Solutions North America , FDM4 International , Computer Generated Solutions , OptiTex USA , Alvanon and more .
